title: New: Baby Guru – We Need Some Space
body:
One year and a half after the European release of **”Pieces”**, Greek psychedelic pop/folk band [**Baby Guru**](http://www.

facebook.com/babyguruband) return with their new album **Marginalia**. The first introduction to their upcoming love child comes with the stunning **We Need Some Space**, a ’70s inspired synth pop with a Bowie-esque gentle glamorous groove diffusing in its artistic circle and flourishing the tone of a classic with its ambitious production! **Sir Kosmiche**, **Prins Obi** and **King Elephant** sail in the sea of the past while dissolving the echoes in the abyss with their own unique signature of this grandiose sonic palette that so gloriously create! **Marginalia LP** will drop on March 24th via [**Inner Ear Records**](http://www.inner-ear.gr/gr/releases/). \[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/137844894″ params=”auto\_play=false&hide\_related=false&visual=true” width=”100%” height=”450″ iframe=”true” /\]
